version: 无广告版本: v6.25，最新版本: v7.40

desc.en: A powerful and versatile compressed file management tool that provides fast decompression speed and various other useful functions。
desc.zh: 一个强大的多功能压缩文件管理工具，可提供很快的解压缩速度和其他各种实用功能。

desc.en: A lightweight icon organization and launcher tool that helps you organize, access and manage your favorite applications and say goodbye to a cluttered desktop.
desc.zh: 一款轻量级的图标整理、启动工具，帮助你组织、访问和管理你喜爱的应用程序，告别凌乱的桌面

desc.en: A fast, secure, and free web browser that meets the browser requirements of modern websites. Chrome is characterized by simplicity and speed.
desc.zh: 一款快速、安全且免费的网络浏览器，能很好地满足新型网站对浏览器的要求。Chrome的特点是简洁、快速。
